send.msg1: The network fee has raised and the remaining network gas is no sufficient
send.msg2: This password has already been used. Please try another.
send.msg5: Please only use Chinese/English characters or numbers
send.msg6: Password must be at least 6 characters long
send.msg8: Please make sure each packets' minimum amount is 0.0001 ETH or more
send.title: Send Red Packet
send.commandDes: A password is required to open red packets
send.tip: Red packets that are not opened within 24 hours will be refunded
send.countDes: Gas fee needed for grabbing packet

send.msg1: 由于交易费上涨，使预留的交易费不足以支付抢红包
send.msg2: 这个口令已经被使用，换一个吧
send.msg5: 只能输入中文，英文和数字
send.msg8: 一个红包最小金额0.0001 ETH
send.title: 发红包
send.commandDes: 抢红包必须输入以上口令
send.tip: 未领取的红包将于24小时后发起退款
send.countDes: 部分将用来支付抢红包交易费

send.msg1: 由於交易費上漲，使預留的交易費不足以支付搶紅包
send.msg2: 這個口令已經被使用，換一個吧
send.msg5: 只能輸入中文、英文和數字
send.msg8: 一個紅包最小金額0.0001 ETH
send.title: 發紅包
send.commandDes: 搶紅包必須輸入以上口令
send.tip: 未領取的紅包將於24小時後發起退款
send.countDes: 部分將用來支付搶紅包交易費
